channel.title: Serverstatus question - please answer
channel.description:
Hey guys , i got my server on the moparscape serverstatus , but when i updated it detected as offline
so my question is , will it go back to 100% ? i proted on 01/08/10 and it detected one time offline
its at 99% now. and how long will it take to get it 100% back? it rlly sucks , 7 players instead of 30
thanks
-Mageman-

item.title: Serverstatus question - please answer
item.dc:creator: @aznboi594 aznboi594
item.description:
@aznboi594 wrote:

I am pretty sure it is going to take a bit of time for it to go to 100% again. Just wait. it should eventually go to 100%

Read full topic
